doc:
George H. Reed https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_H._Reed 0 George Henry Reed (November 27, 1866 – November 6, 1952) was an American actor working in the Hollywood film industry in both the silent and sound eras. His first major film was the 1920 Huckleberry Finn where he played Jim. He is also remembered for the film The Green Pastures (1936) that featured an all African American cast and the orderly Conover in MGM's Dr. Kildare series. George_Henry_Reed ( November_27 , 1866 – November_6_,_1952 ) was an_American_actor working in the_Hollywood_film_industry in both the_silent_and_sound_eras . His_first_major_film was the_1920_Huckleberry_Finn where he played Jim . He is_also_remembered for the_film The_Green_Pastures ( 1936_) that featured an all_African_American_cast and the_orderly_Conover in MGM 's_Dr._Kildare_series .
